文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
证据片段: Expanding mandrel (Simulated Fuel Expansion or Simfex) pellet-cladding interaction (PCI) simulation tests were performed on unirradiated Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-4, zirconium-lined Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-3A alloy-lined Zircaloy-2, and graphite-lined Zircaloy-4 tubing with high-purity argon and iodine.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
证据片段: SIMFEX tests were also performed on irradiated Zircaloy-4 cladding in iodine.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
证据片段: Sensitivity tests were performed on unirradiated unlined Zircaloy-4 tubing in order to establish SIMFEX test conditions that simulate PCI.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
证据片段: Test variables included test temperature, core compression rate (or sample strain rate) and iodine partial pressure.

文献ID: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
证据片段: Iodine SIMFEX tests on unlined unirradiated and irradiated Zircaloy-4 showed that the PCI simulation test conditions produce fractures similar to fuel rod ramp tests.
